Comments_List: I learned how to program a study, analyze results, and write up an official Psychology paper.
This semester was a great opportunity to practice research skills, techniques, and experimental design.

Through my Senior Essay I was able to focus in on the research I have been doing in the lab. Through writing my thesis I was able to synthesize my research and analyze it in the broader context of memory and drug research.
The course was organized very well, and I had a lot of guidance from my advisors.
The course was great for gaining practice in research skills and was very highly individualized to meet my needs and research goals.
I would recommend doing research in order to fulfill the BS requirement of the psychology major.
I recommend this course to anyone who wants experience in research.
